newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan robber dies after slashing, penis-biting.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan robber dies after slashing, penis-biting.

text.p: A Taiwan robber died in hospital on Tuesday after one of his victims bit his penis and another seized his butcher's knife and slashed him, state and local media reported on Tuesday.
Cheng Chin-lung was holding two couples hostage when his partner ran off. He then tried to force one of the women to perform oral sex but she bit his penis, state-run television reported.
One of the men seized Cheng's knife and slashed him, it said.
A hospital spokesman in Taipei told Reuters that Cheng later died of multiple stab wounds.
Police said they were questioning the couples. It was not known what happened to Cheng's partner.
